parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values: **zh** and **en**. The value zh indicates Chinese, and the value en indicates English.

parameters.name: SubTypeIds
parameters.description:
The ID of the anomalous event subtype. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

> You can call the **DescribeEventTypes** operation to query the ID of anomalous event subtype.
